edu.cnm.deepdive.security

Class PasswordGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.security.PasswordGenerator
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SecurePasswordGenerator

    public class PasswordGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of a simple password generator. This includes support for elementary character-set-based rules, (optional inclusion of specified sets and exclusion of a small number of ambiguous characters), but not for more advanced expressions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    David Martinez

      • PasswordGenerator

        public PasswordGenerator(int minLength,
                         int maxLength,
                         boolean IncludeUpperCase,
                         boolean IncludeLowerCase,
                         boolean IncludeNumbers,
                         boolean IncludePunctuation,
                         boolean ExcludeAmbiguous)
        Parameters:
        minLength - Minimum length of password to be generated.
        maxLength - Maximum length of password to be generated.
        IncludeUpperCase - Include upper case characters.
        IncludeLowerCase - Include lower case characters.
        IncludeNumbers - Include numbers.
        IncludePunctuation - Include punctuation.
        ExcludeAmbiguous - Exclude the lower case "l" and upper case "O" characters.

        Test rig for generating passwords
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line parameters for password generation options. Instantiate PasswordGenerator class for testing password generation.
